The waffle weave fabric of the main shirt is quite light weight. Honestly, that part looks boring and I wouldn't necessarily have bought the shirt if it were all like that. But the semi-sheer chifony sleeves are feminine and flowy. I love the contrast of colors. Great with jeans or khakis.

I love this top and wear it all the time. It is waffle weave body is very light, and the sleeves cover up my older-lady upper arms without adding any warmth, so it’s nice for summer. It is very easy to put a pull in the waffle weave part, not at all dog claw friendly! Also the sleeves are very delicate. That said, it does wash and dry well without special care, just be careful when putting it and taking it off. I am pleased enough that I will probably order more in different colors.
